name: Blacksmith
ability: You start knowing how many Outsiders are in play. All Outsiders are drunk, even if you are dead. [-? to +? Outsiders]
firstNightReminder: Show the Blacksmith the number of in-play outsiders.

jinxes.reason: If the Marionette thinks that they are the Blacksmith, -? to +? Outsiders might have been removed or added.

name: Pirate
ability: You start knowing how many Pirates are in-play. If Pirates are the only good characters alive, good wins. [+0 to +2 Pirates]
firstNightReminder: Show each Pirate the number of in-play Pirates.

name: Tycoon
ability: Each night*, learn if you shook hands with an evil player today. 1 player that you have ever shaken hands with is drunk.
otherNightReminder: Choose whether or not to make a player the Tycoon shook hands with drunk. Wake the Tycoon and nod yes if they shook hands with an evil player, otherwise shake your head no.

name: Hustler
ability: Each night*, learn the character that nominated you today. If you are mad about being the Hustler, you receive false info.

name: Patient
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose to wake: choose a good character to gain the ability of for each night you were asleep.

name: Prophet
ability: On your 1st night, choose a day number: if all dead players are good that dawn, they are resurrected as Travellers.

name: Machinist
ability: On your 1st day, you may visit the Storyteller to become a non-listed character, even if drunk or poisoned [+0 to +2 Machinists]

name: Queen
ability: If both of your neighbours are good, they learn who you are. Anyone mad about a Queen being in-play might be executed.
firstNightReminder: If both of the Queen's neighbours are good wake them and show them the 'This character selected you' card and then the Queen token

name: Palm Reader
ability: The Demon attacks one night before it takes effect. Each night, you learn which player(s) the Demon attacked.

name: Donkey Wrangler
ability: If you are nominated, the Demon must be executed today, or your team loses. [Your token is square]

name: Tramp
ability: If there are any votes to execute you, you might be executed immediately.

name: Golden Child
ability: The 1st player to nominate you, turns evil that night. You cannot nominate yourself 1st.

name: Sicilian
ability: Each night, you may choose a player (not yourself): if they are not executed today, their team wins. All players know the chosen player.

jinxes.reason: If the Senator ability is active, the Sicilian ability cannot announce or cause an evil player to win with only evil living neighbours.
If the Sicilian is dead, the Sicilian ability cannot cause a Minion to win on the final day.

name: Senator
ability: Players can only nominate their living neighbors, even if you are dead.

name: Soul Hammer
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. After the final night, the dead may not talk to the living.
